content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. I understand you need some plumbing help. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Emily! Could you please provide the address where the plumbing service is needed?
Let me verify if 123 Maple Lane, Rivertown is within our service area. Just a moment.
I'm sorry, Emily, it appears your address is currently outside our service area. We usually do not serve that location. Is there some flexibility or another nearby address where we can assist you?
Well, I really need help here, but no, I don't have another address. Can't you make an exception?
I understand the urgency, Emily. I will check if we can arrange something special for your situation. Please hold on.
reason: Customer outside service area but insists on scheduling
